content: {"name": "Crisis Control Ministry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "We now offer phone interviews alongside in-person interviews for assistance. If you prefer interviewing via phone, please call our Client Services phone lines for assistance at 336.724.7453 or if you are a resident of Kernersville, call 336.996.5401.\nView our locations & hours in the footer of the web page for information specific to each office. Persons living in the zip code areas of 27107 and 27127 must first go to Sunnyside Ministries for assistance. Stokes County residents must first go to East Stokes Outreach Ministry and King Outreach Ministry for financial assistance. ", "email": "", "url": "https://www.crisiscontrol.org/what-we-do/services/information-to-bring.html", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "431 West Bodenhamer Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Kernersville", "state_province": "NC", "postal_code": "27284", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 36.12923070000001, "longitude": -80.0792033}, "phones": [{"number": "(336) 996-5401", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "18:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "18:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of household income required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required on site"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "A photo ID is required"}]}
